column6:
Just when they thought the battle was over...things only gets worse for Japan's top heroes! With a new-and unusual-predicament afoot, all our heroes have to do is get past the army, navy, air force, marines... Getting home never seemed so hard before! Join the Big Hero 6 for the action-packed conclusion to their first mini-series in the new millennium from fan-favorite X-Scribe Chris Claremont and rising-star artist David Nakayama!,2009,1
Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | letterer:Ed Dukeshire | inker:David Nakayama | inker:Terry Pallot | colorist:Emily Warren
